item.description:
Meeting Format

1. Introductions (15 mins)

3. Guest speaker, Karen Glover and moderated discussion (1 hour)

Karen Glover’s marketing expertise comes from more than 20 years of experience across a broad spectrum of organizations, from Fortune 100 companies to small technology start-ups to boot-strapped nonprofits. Her passion is helping mission-based organizations tell their stories. Glover is the founder of Marketers Making a Difference – a group of marketers that meet once a month to assist local nonprofits. She writes about nonprofit marketing on her blog http://marketermakesa....

4. Announcements, opportunities, connections (10 mins)

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the room 15 minutes early. You'll recognize me from my photo!
item.name: Building a Media Campaign: How to Gain Priceless Exposure for your Nonprofit
